html.p: Jamel (Java Agent-based Macro-Economic Laboratory) is an open source agent-based framework dedicated to the modeling, the simulation and the analysis of complex monetary economies. It is developped by Dr. P. Seppecher (CEPN, University of Paris 13, France), Dr. I. Salle (University of Amsterdam and Utrecht School of Economics, The Netherlands) and Dr. H. Hagedorn (Business and Information Technology School, Berlin, Germany).
